explanation: To complete the task of putting a clean wash cloth in the tub, the objects involved would be the Cloth and the Tub. The Cloth would be used to put in the Tub. Additionally, the Cloth would need to be rinsed from the Tub before putting it back, so the Tub would also be involved in this step. Finally, putting a clean cloth in the tub would again involve the Cloth and the Tub.
